initial_firm_notification: Two or more of the following: Email, Fax, Letter, Press Release, Telephone, Visit
distribution_pattern: Product was shipped to the following states GA & TN
product_description: Cafe' Intermezzo White Chocolate Amaretto Cheesecake 7 lbs Ingredients: Eggs, Cream Cheese, Sugar, Amaretto Syrup, Whipped Cream, Almond Crust (Graham Crackers, Butter, Sugar, Almonds, Vanilla Extract), Vanilla Extract, White Chocolate, Almond Extract, Corn Starch.
